requirements_addressed: Epic pipeline test covers create -> refine -> sync -> status full cycle
Feature pipeline test covers create -> refine -> cross-command suggestions
Multi-pattern test verifies all three patterns in one hierarchy view
Documentation build test verifies no broken links
User workflow simulations cover James's use cases
Tests use temporary directories (no side effects on real data)
Tests document the user scenario they simulate
Pipeline tests verify intermediate states (not just final state)
requirements_remaining: Documentation build test actually runs mkdocs (skipped - mkdocs not installed in test env; validated via YAML parsing and file existence checks instead)

completion_promises.criterion_text: Epic pipeline test covers create -> refine -> sync -> status full cycle
completion_promises.evidence: TestEpicCreateRefineSyncPipeline class contains 6 tests covering the full cycle: test_epic_create_produces_valid_file, test_initial_completeness_is_low, test_epic_refine_updates_score_and_history, test_sync_marks_graphiti_fields, test_epic_status_shows_all_fields, and test_full_pipeline_preserves_all_data. Each test verifies a distinct pipeline stage.

completion_promises.criterion_text: Feature pipeline test covers create -> refine -> cross-command suggestions
completion_promises.evidence: TestFeatureCreateRefinePipeline (3 tests), TestFeatureRefineBddIntegration (3 tests), and TestFeatureRefineEarsIntegration (3 tests) cover feature create linked to epic, feature refine updating markdown, parent epic hierarchy verification, BDD/EARS cross-command suggestions via /generate-bdd and /formalize-ears.

completion_promises.criterion_text: Multi-pattern test verifies all three patterns in one hierarchy view
completion_promises.evidence: TestMixedHierarchyRendering class (4 tests) creates epics with all three patterns (features, direct, mixed) in one workspace, verifies spec renders all patterns, verifies status displays correctly for each, and validates progress calculation works for all. TestPatternEvolution (4 tests) covers pattern growth from direct to mixed.

completion_promises.criterion_text: Documentation build test verifies no broken links
completion_promises.evidence: TestMkdocsBuildStructure (6 tests) validates mkdocs.yml parsing, nav section, command references, and page existence. TestInternalLinksValid (1 test) recursively extracts all nav paths and verifies every referenced file exists on disk. TestNewPagesInNavigation (4 tests) verifies epic, feature, hierarchy, and sync commands are in nav.

completion_promises.criterion_text: User workflow simulations cover James's use cases
completion_promises.evidence: Five workflow simulation classes: TestHappyPathWorkflow (iterative refinement to 80%+), TestQuickModeWorkflow (--quick flag), TestFocusModeWorkflow (--focus risks), TestStandaloneModeWorkflow (no Graphiti), TestRecoveryModeWorkflow (manual edit then sync). Total 15 tests covering all 5 user scenarios from the task spec.

completion_promises.criterion_text: Tests use temporary directories (no side effects on real data)
completion_promises.evidence: All pipeline tests use the 'workspace' fixture (pytest tmp_path-based) which creates isolated docs/epics, docs/features, docs/bdd, docs/requirements directories. No real filesystem data is read or modified. Automatic cleanup via pytest tmp_path.

completion_promises.criterion_text: Tests document the user scenario they simulate
completion_promises.evidence: Every test class has a docstring describing the user scenario being simulated (e.g., 'User scenario: Product owner James creates an epic, iteratively refines it...'). Every test method has a docstring describing the specific step and assertion being verified.
